tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ********* ****** **** * ****** ********* *** ***** **********l took my 95 year old mother who had fallen down one day and then stopped walking and standing. Doctor got her X ray done and told us there was no fracture. He gave sufficient time to my mother  and advised us to make her walk somehow with human support and walker and cautioned us that unless that is done it may become miserable for her as well as us. We followed the advise and after about 5 days or so my mother started walking on her own after a gap of 3 weeks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rajeev performed surgery for knee replacement in both my knees and my experience has been great overall. He genuinely cares for his patients and looks after them. He kept in touch even after the surgery to make sure I was doing fine. He is very flexible in his approach and caters to the request of his patients. I would like to thank Dr. Rajeev from the bottom of my heart for his treatment.

** ***** ***** ** * **** **** ****** **** * **** **** ********* ** ******** ******* ** **********.
   I am thankful to him for his dedicated treatment and concentration over relief from bone related problems either related to surgery or medicine or physiotherapy problems.
  We are consulting him for bone fractured of my mother in law case, wife's cartilage related problems and Dr Verma resolved problems in very satisfactory way, appreciable *** * ****,** ** **** ****** ** *********** ** ******

I was  diagnosed by him  for extensor tendonitis  which  i got around 16 oct  then i was advised painkiller   crape bandage   and volini ice pack  it was  severe internal swelling   after 5 days on follow  up when i told my pain is not settled down he just told stop  painkiller *** **** ******** dnt get proper instruction   when to use crape bandage  or   just  told one sponge   ball exercise with  no  instruction   till when how many tym told for  hot packs     he dnt even  provide a prescription   in follow  up if pains take sos  but as  when i  started put  increasing work load   pain ups  severely   another dr which i  went after a month also  couldn't gve ryt treatment  my family  used to trust him blindly  years  thats what we did same in follow  up  too that he would always  tell  proper treatment initially i am still suffering  i  a mbbs student  my full work is writing  in dec 3 rd dr gve me ryt treatment  just with many strengthening exercises and ice pack was to be gven  for reducing inflammation  f**  *** *****  ********* * ********  *** ** **** **** ** **** ****** ******* ******* ** ***** ** ******** i am gving  my university exams  in pain  * *** ** *********  ****** ** *** ****  * ***** *** ** *** ************* *** *** *** *********  ** *** ** ***** ***** * ** *** ** ******* ***   *** *******   **  ***  **** *** ***** **** ** ****  **** ** *********  ****** ********   * *** ** **** ***** ****  ***  *** ***** *** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Very friendly and spoke patiently , and  explained all .

I really appreciate and fearless to bring my 78 yrs old mom for her Hipjoint operation. 

Though today is my first day in Manipal , but am confident and proudly recommend Dr verma for anyone .

The recommendation for ankle pain didn't worked, like ice pack was recommended. It made the problem even worsen. Also Dr hardly spent time to understand the problem before giving medication

Visited another Dr, who recommended hot water bottle for pain relief and it did wonders

Sorry Dr

i am suffering from ankle arthritis due to chikungunia. & i was told him that i cannot walk,stand up due to sever pain from last two months. but he said its chikungunia post effects & just proscribe a crocine pain relief tablet.Now i m going to a new doctor for arthritis(Rheumatologist) .atleast he could suggest me for Rheumatologist.

Dr. Verma patiently listened to my lower back pain problem and checked everything. He didn't even ask for an x-ray since it was not required. Usually doctors tend to perform a lot of tests but Dr. Verma was very critical in that aspect. He advised about body movement and also suggested for no physiotherapy since it was not required at that moment. 

I would highly recommend Dr. Verma at Fortis hospital in gurgaon.

Have been consulting Doctor Rajeev for last few years. Best part about visiting him is to have no unnecessary tests. Doctor focuses on simple and natural ways of treatment.
Will always trust him for future ailment.
very good experience and highly recommend him for back ache and related issues. doctor listened patiently and guided well.

Treatment by minimum medicine only, while others were Keen to do knee fluid injection treatment and 80% chances of working this technology
Took second opinion from Dr Rajeev Kumar Verma and happy with the treatment at Manipal Hospitals Dwarka

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very good experience. and doctor is Very Experienced. ambience is great and all staff are so helpful. visited manipal hospital dwarka.
He seems to okay so far. As my case was sprain and I just needed confirmation that its not a fracture. I will update later once i get further advise from doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He breaks the taboo of 'Medical science'  gradually becoming a dirty business. He's indeed an honest doctor and keeps transparency in his recommendation. Explanation is easy, and he is a great listener. Unlike other doctors, he writes the medicine or test only if needed. Great doctor!
Actively listen to the case records and ask questions to  know the past medical records. Present plan of action to correct the problem. Recommend to others!!

Unsatisfactory experience. He didn't bothered to examine properly. **** ** *********** ** ********** *********** ***** * *** ******* ****** *** asked to revisit in few days. Would never recommend anyone.
Decent experience. But did not examine much. I went with swelling near ribs area. Suggested medication and some fomentation.
Professional and help in understanding the problem and also to make understand the solution/treatement. This is good.

V. Good doctor. Gives appropriate time to the patient. Listens to patients calmly. Would recommend to everyone.
Got my plantar fasciitis treatment done.

review: Extremely friendly, explained the issue very well *** ********** **** *********. Would recommend to others if they have any joint issues.

review: The doctor has a pleasant and friendly demeanour and listened patiently to understand the problem. He took time to explain the issues and prescribe *********** medication. It was a nice experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Rajeev was patient enough to listen to my problem and gave satisfactory explaination . He did not ask me to get any unneccessary tests done .
Experience was extremely good . The doctor explained everything and cleared all my doubts. Later he advised the way forward.
He was very empathetic.  Heard my problem in detail and then gave me a good prescription. I had runners knee,  will recommend him for any sports injury.
Good. Quite reasonable in his dealing
good and quite satisfactory.
